pyfluka.base.ConfigParser.parse(config)[source]¶

Parsing function :param config (str): filename of config file :return (dict): configuration as dict

IOError: if config file does not exist IllegalArgument: if validation fails; see _validate

GraphBuilder module¶

pyfluka.base.GraphBuilder.build_graph(init_list)[source]¶

Builds path of plugins to be analysed :param init_list (list): list of plugins in order of execution :return (networkx.DiGraph): full analysis graph

pyfluka.base.GraphBuilder.get_paths(graph)[source]¶

Determines all possible paths between input and output node :param graph (networkx.DiGraph): graph to be analysed :return: list of all paths b/w input and output note for given path
